mapper.insert: INSERT INTO testdb.comment(comment_seq, board_seq, order_num, comment_content, comment_writer, comment_id, comment_date) VALUES ( null, #{board_seq}, #{order_num}, #{comment_content}, #{comment_writer}, #{comment_id}, now() ); UPDATE testdb.comment SET group_num = (SELECT last_insert_id()) WHERE comment_seq = (SELECT last_insert_id());
